## Enhance Project Directory Structure Overview ```plaintext app ├── api ............... data routes │ └── index.mjs ├── browser ........... browser JavaScript │ └── index.mjs ├── components ........ single file web components │ └── my-card.mjs ├── elements .......... custom element pure functions │ └── my-header.mjs ├── pages ............. file-based routing │ └── index.html └── head.mjs .......... custom component ``` ## Basic Data Operations with @begin/data ```JavaScript import data from '@begin/data' const table = 'pizza' await data.set([ // save multiple pizzas at once {table, key: 'bbq-chkn', toppings: ['chicken', 'chz', 'bbq sauce']}, {table, key: 'southwest', toppings: ['chilis', 'red onion', 'corn', 'chz']}, {table, key: 'hawaiian', toppings: ['chz', 'ham', 'pineapple']}, ]) const bestPizza = data.get({table, key: 'hawaiian'}) console.log(bestPizza.toppings.at(-1)) // 'pineapple' ``` ## Example of Atomic CSS Class Composition in HTML ```HTML <article class='font-sans text1-xl leading4 m-auto mt0 mb0 mt2-md mb2-md mt4-lg mb4-lg p0 p2-sm p4-md p5-lg p6-xl'/> ``` ## Styling for Enhance Landing Page Elements (CSS) ```CSS body { background: white; } main { color: var(--ateneo); } h1 span:nth-child(2), main h2 { color: var(--dark-purple); } .text-container { max-inline-size: 42rem; } #cloud-wide { translate: 20% 50%; z-index: -1; inline-size: max(300px, 60vw); opacity: 0.1; } #cloud-medium { translate: -20% -50%; z-index: -1; inline-size: max(100px, 40vw); opacity: 0.2; } landing-axol-on-rainbow-and-cloud { inline-size: 66%; } #axol-wink { max-inline-size: min(50vw, 12rem); } ``` ## Initial Layout Markup with Enhance HTML ```html
